name: @ionic-native/camera
readme: Improve this doc # Camera ``` $ ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-camera $ npm install --save @ionic-native/camera ``` ## [Usage Documentation](https://ionicframework.com/docs/native/camera/) Plugin Repo: [https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-camera](https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-camera) Take a photo or capture video. Requires the Cordova plugin: `cordova-plugin-camera`. For more info, please see the [Cordova Camera Plugin Docs](https://github.com/apache/cordova-plugin-camera). [Warning] Since IOS 10 the camera requires permissions to be placed in your config.xml add ```xml You can take photos ``` inside of the
